metadata.title: OurSplit | Division de gastos simple
metadata.description: Crea un grupo y registra gastos para calcular automaticamente quien debe a quien.
metadata.settlementDescription: Revisa el detalle de la liquidacion
metadata.newGroupDescription: Crea un nuevo grupo y invita a miembros.

hero.subtitleLine1: Calcula automaticamente liquidaciones de viajes o eventos.
hero.subtitleLine2: Ve quien debe cuanto de un vistazo.

features.title: Simple. Inteligente. Fluido.
features.subtitle: Deja las cuentas en nuestras manos y disfruta el viaje.

create.title: Creacion rapida
create.description: Crea un grupo sin registro y comparte el URL para invitar.

record.title: Registra gastos
record.description: Anota quien pago que y elige participantes facilmente.

settle.title: Liquidacion automatica
settle.description: Calcula quien paga a quien con el minimo de transferencias.

create.title: Crea un grupo
create.description: Solo escribe el nombre del grupo. Sin cuenta.

add.title: Agrega miembros y gastos
add.description: Agrega participantes y registra quien pago que.

intro.title: 1. Terms
intro.body: These Terms of Service ("Terms") set forth the conditions for using the services provided on the Walica website ("Service"). Users of the Service ("Users") must use the Service in accordance with these Terms.

applicability.title: 2. Applicability
applicability.body: These Terms apply to all relationships between Users and the Service regarding the use of the Service.

prohibited.title: 3. Prohibited acts
prohibited.body: Users must not engage in any of the following acts when using the Service.
list: Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
Acts related to criminal activity
Acts that destroy or interfere with the functions of the Service's servers or network
Acts that may interfere with the operation of the Service
Collecting or storing personal information about other users
Impersonating other users
Directly or indirectly providing benefits to antisocial forces in connection with the Service
Any other acts deemed inappropriate by the Service

suspension.title: 4. Suspension of the Service
suspension.body: If the Service determines that any of the following circumstances apply, it may suspend or discontinue all or part of the Service without prior notice to Users.
list: When performing maintenance or updates of the system for the Service
When provision of the Service is difficult due to force majeure such as earthquakes, lightning, fire, power outages, or natural disasters
When computers or communication lines are stopped due to an accident
When the Service determines that the provision of the Service is difficult for other reasons
suspension.bodyAfter: The Service shall not be liable for any disadvantage or damage suffered by Users or third parties due to suspension or interruption of the Service, regardless of the reason.

restriction.title: 5. Restrictions and deregistration
restriction.body: The Service may, without prior notice, restrict Users' use of all or part of the Service or delete a User's registration in the following cases.
list: If any provision of these Terms is violated
If the Service otherwise deems the use of the Service inappropriate
restriction.bodyAfter: The Service shall not be liable for any damages incurred by Users as a result of actions taken pursuant to this section.

change.title: 6. Changes to the Service
change.body: The Service may change the contents of the Service or discontinue the provision of the Service without notice to Users, and shall not be liable for any damages incurred by Users as a result.

termsChange.title: 7. Changes to the Terms
termsChange.body: The Service may change these Terms at any time without notice to Users if it deems it necessary.

assignment.title: 8. Prohibition of transfer of rights and obligations
assignment.body: Users may not assign or pledge their position in the user agreement or any rights or obligations under these Terms to a third party without the Service's prior written consent.

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.body: The Service shall not be liable in the following cases.
list: Damages incurred by users due to downloading content provided by third parties through this site or accessing linked sites operated by third parties

Damages incurred by users as a result of unauthorized alteration of this site, unauthorized access to data, computer viruses, or other wrongful acts, even when the Service has taken reasonable security measures
Any other damages arising from the use or non-use of this site (including information provision by the Service), including mental distress or other financial losses
disclaimer.bodyAfter: Even if the Service is found liable in any of the preceding items, its liability shall be limited to cases of willful misconduct or gross negligence, and to direct and ordinary damages.

governingLaw.title: 10. Governing law and jurisdiction
governingLaw.body: These Terms are governed by Japanese law. In the event of a dispute regarding the Service, the court having jurisdiction over the Service's head office shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

compliance.title: 1. Privacy Policy
compliance.body: This site complies with the Act on the Protection of Personal Information, relevant guidelines, and other applicable laws and regulations regarding the handling of personal information.

safety.title: 2. Security management of personal information
safety.body: We implement appropriate organizational, physical, human, and technical measures to prevent leakage, loss, or damage of personal information handled by this site and to manage personal information safely.

acquisitionCompliance.title: 3. Compliance regarding acquisition of personal information
acquisitionCompliance.body: When we acquire, use, or provide personal information, we comply with the following.

acquisition.title: 4. Acquisition of personal information
acquisition.body: We may obtain personal information related to general users of this site ("Users") or advertisers on this site ("Advertisers") to the extent necessary to operate the services provided through this site.

purpose.title: 5. Purpose of use
purpose.body: We will not use personal information beyond the scope necessary to achieve the purposes below, except as required by law or with the individual's consent.
list: Operation, maintenance, and management of this site
Provision and introduction of services through this site
Surveys to improve the quality of this site

provision.title: 6. Provision of personal information
provision.body: Except as required by law, we will not provide personal information acquired based on the individual's consent to third parties without prior consent. We will also respond appropriately to requests for disclosure, correction, addition, deletion, or notification of purposes of use in accordance with laws and regulations.

purposeChange.title: 7. Changes to purpose of use
purposeChange.body: The purposes of use specified above may be changed.

thirdParty.title: 8. Entrustment to third parties
thirdParty.body: When entrusting all or part of the handling of personal information to a third party, we will examine its suitability and provide necessary and appropriate supervision so that the entrusted party can safely manage the personal information.

review.title: 9. Improvement and review
review.body: We will inspect our handling of personal information, management systems, and initiatives, and continuously improve and review them.

disposal.title: 10. Disposal of personal information
disposal.body: When personal information is no longer necessary in light of the purpose of use, we will delete or dispose of it by appropriate methods to prevent external leakage, as far as necessary for business operations.

contact.title: 11. Contact for complaints and consultations
contact.body: We will establish a contact desk and person in charge for inquiries regarding the handling of personal information.
